```{python}

import gsc_model_functions as gmf
n_patients = 40
sigma =0.01
mu = 0.075
samples1 = gmf.trunc_norm(mu,sigma,n_patients)
samples2 = gmf.trunc_norm(0.15,sigma,n_patients)
samples3 = gmf.trunc_norm(0.005,sigma,n_patients)


plt.hist(samples1)
plt.hist(samples2)
plt.hist(samples3)
plt.show()

```
